Regarding false positives, some antivirus software, such as Avast and Kaspersky, may flag the Verus software as "not-a-virus" or "PUP" (Potentially Unwanted Program). Moreover, the Verus technology offers a range of innovative features, including Public Blockchains as a Service (PBaaS) and cross-chain currency conversion technology.
